Controllers

Class AppointmentsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.AppointmentsController

  • public class AppointmentsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Appointments Controller . have all the methods that connect the client GUI to the database . the methods send request to the database and recieve the database results.
    Author:
    Muhamad Igbaria

      • getTimes

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getTimes(java.lang.String doctor_id,
                                                        java.lang.String patient_id)
        send request to database to return all available times to set an appointment , the times has to be not overlap with the patient's and doctor's appointments .
        Parameters:
        doctor_id - : doctor which the appointment set to him
        patient_id: - patient to set appointment fro him
        Returns:
        all available times for set appointment

      • addNewAppointment

        public static boolean addNewAppointment(java.lang.String doctor_id,
                                        java.lang.String patient_id,
                                        java.util.Date time)
        send request to database to add new appointment to appointments table
        Parameters:
        doctor_id - : doctor which the appointment set to him
        patient_id: - patient to set appointment fro him
        time - : the choosed time from available times to set as appointment
        Returns:
        true if the add success , false else.
